casebody.data:
98-3201 (La. 4/23/99)

STATE of Louisiana v. Roscoe MEDIOUS. No. 98-K-3201. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 23, 1999.

IN RE: Medious, Roscoe; — Defendants); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review; Parish of Jefferson 24th Judicial District Court Div. “F” Number 97-4801; to the Court of Appeal, Fifth Circuit, Number 98-KA-0419

Denied.

CALOGERO, C.J. not on panel.
